description: This file defines and exports three React functional components: LoadingState, ErrorState, and EmptyState. These components are used to represent different UI states in the application related to data fetching and user feedback.

methods.name: LoadingState({ title = "Loading…", description = "Fetching recipes." })
methods.description: A React component that displays a loading indicator with optional title and description.

methods.name: ErrorState({ title = "Something went wrong", description = "Please try again.", onRetry, })
methods.description: A React component that displays an error message with an optional retry button.

methods.name: EmptyState({ title = "No recipes found", description = "Try a different search term or clear filters.", action, })
methods.description: A React component that indicates no data was found, with optional action controls.

ctags.name: EmptyState
ctags.signature: ({ title = "No recipes found", description = "Try a different search term or clear filters.", action, })

ctags.name: ErrorState
ctags.signature: ({ title = "Something went wrong", description = "Please try again.", onRetry, })
